lead_paragraph: PIERCE--Derek Bryan, May 29, 1952 - January 5, 2016., born in Liverpool England, died peacefully on January 5, age 63. Survived by his daughter Ashley, her husband David and much loved grandson Mason; together with his partner, Katrina. In the United Kingdom, he leaves a brother Alan and sister-in-law Audrey; together with a niece Emma, nephew Anthony and their families. A Memorial Service for Derek will be held on January 22 at 11am at the Marble Collegiate Church, 5th Avenue at 29th Street. A reception will follow. The family asks donations be made to Hospice by the Sea Foundation in Florida or St. Jude Children's Research Hospital. 1/3
